meanings.definition: proteins that regulate appetite and metabolism
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that leptins help control how hungry we feel.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying how leptins influence our body weight.
meanings.sent3: The leptins in my body must be on vacation because I can't stop eating!
meanings.sent4: Her leptins were like little traffic lights, telling her when to eat and when to stop.
meanings.sent5: Imagine leptins as tiny chefs in your body, cooking up your hunger levels.

meanings.sent1: Leptins are hormones that tell our brain we are full.
meanings.sent2: The leptins released by fat cells play a role in our appetite.
meanings.sent3: I wish my leptins could talk to my brain and say, 'No more snacks!'
meanings.sent4: Her leptins were like messengers, delivering the 'full' message to her brain.
meanings.sent5: Picture leptins as messengers running from fat cells to the brain, shouting, 'Stop eating!'

meanings.definition: signaling molecules that affect energy balance
meanings.sent1: Leptins are like little messengers that tell our body how much energy to use.
meanings.sent2: The signaling molecules called leptins help keep our energy levels in check.
meanings.sent3: I imagine leptins as tiny energy coaches, cheering on my body to stay balanced.
meanings.sent4: Her leptins were like conductors in an orchestra, ensuring the perfect energy harmony.
meanings.sent5: Think of leptins as traffic controllers for your body's energy flow, keeping everything smooth.
